title: (x) Miss Sixty logo - Serpentine Sans {Manlio, Lex}
content:
Hi, I would also like to ask for any font resembling the logotype of "miss sixty", i think it is a damn cool typeface for long........

[http://www.northparkcenter.com/resources/d/storefronts/miss\_sixty.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100723160137/http:/www.northparkcenter.com/resources/d/storefronts/miss_sixty.jpg "http://www.northparkcenter.com/resources/d/storefronts/miss\_sixty.jpg")

thanks a million
author: marcadonbalon

comments.content:
I can't tell if there's serifs on the sample or not, but you can also check out [Serpentine Sans.](http://web.archive.org/web/20100723160137/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/serpentine-sans/)

- Lex
I was thinking that as well, but it's indeed very hard to see if there's serifs.
There aren't serifs, as you can see [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20100723160137/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?query_id=12469005&page=1&brand_id=66919). So Lex got it.
many thanks to all of you....
